title: SP launches “Empowering Education through Digital Panel with AI”
description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Sept 7: Study Point (SP), a renowned education institute launched its first-ever “Empowering Education through Digital Panel with Artificial Intelligence”, here today. The initiative was formally introduced by Neeraj Mahajan, Managing Director, Study Point, who provided a detailed overview of how this Smart Education System will revolutionize learning by integrating Artificial Intelligence with digital tools, thereby enhancing the teaching-learning experience. The launching event was graced by Rakesh Koul, former Sarpanch and noted social activist, who was the […]

title: Geoffrey Hinton Says an Ex Once Broke up With Him Using a Chatbot
description: Geoffrey Hinton is a pioneer in artificial intelligence. Now the AI godfather says an ex-girlfriend used it to break up with him.
content:
Geoffrey Hinton has long pioneered the development of artificial intelligence. Little did the AI godfather know that one day, his girlfriend would rely on it to break up with him.

title: Trump Pushes US Nuclear Deals in UK Ahead of State Visit
description: Ahead of US President Donald Trump's state visit to the UK, the White House is lobbying for plans for US companies to build nuclear power plants (NPP) and data centers for artificial intelligence (AI) software in the UK, The Telegraph newspaper reported on Sunday, citing sources familiar with the matter.

title: CA, Delaware attorneys general concerned about OpenAI
description: Bonta’s office said the attorney general is looking into the San Francisco artificial intelligence company’s financial and governance restructuring.

title: BitHarvest - Investor Briefing Document for a better idea
description: Executive Summary BitHarvest is a fast-growing Web3 infrastructure and AI technology company founded in 2023, with operations in Malaysia. title: Who really benefits from AI?
description: Artificial intelligence must be not only efficient but just, writes Shahin Hossain.
content: Not long ago, a man in Detroit, Robert Williams, was wrongfully arrested for a crime he did not commit. The Detroit police had relied on facial recognition software that misidentified him. The algorithm was efficient, but it was wrong, and the innoce... [4421 chars]

title: AI've Got A Co-Author
description: From ChatGPT drafts to short stories and even poetry, many writers are using Artificial Intelligence (AI) tools for creative works
content: There was a time when a writer’s worst enemy was the blinking cursor. That maddening vertical line mocked you, daring you to produce a sentence worthy of the blank page. Today, the cursor still blinks—but now, it doesn’t blink alone. On the other sid... [5655 chars]
